name: license-grabber
description: A utility for getting the license information from the dependencies in a Node.js project

scripts.build:local: rimraf build && tsc && @powershell copy -r lib/license-grabber build
scripts.build:ci: rimraf build && tsc && cp -r lib/license-grabber build
scripts.test-package:prep: npm run build:local && rimraf test && mkdir test && npm uninstall -g license-grabber
scripts.test-package:copy: @powershell copy -r build test/build && @powershell copy package.json test/package.json
scripts.test-package: npm run test-package:prep && npm run test-package:copy && npm i -g ./test

author: Tyler Poplawski
